Package com.inhousegreenhouse.ch.backend.model.sensor.core

Class AnalogSensor<T extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inhousegreenhouse.ch.backend.model.sensor.core.BaseSensor<T>
      • com.inhousegreenhouse.ch.backend.model.sensor.core.AnalogSensor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of data read from the sensor.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISensor<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumiditySensor, MoistureSensor, TemperatureSensor, WaterSensor
    public abstract class AnalogSensor<T extends java.lang.Number>
extends BaseSensor<T>
    This class represents an analog sensor and is used to read the analog value of the sensor.

      • AnalogSensor

        public AnalogSensor​(java.lang.String nameId,
                    Position sensorPosition,
                    T defaultValue,
                    ADC adc,
                    int channel)
        Set the sensor value.
        Parameters:
        nameId - The sensor name.
        sensorPosition - The sensor position inside the greenhouse.
        defaultValue - The sensor default value.
        adc - The ADC to use.
        channel - The channel to use.

    • Method Detail

      • getConversionData

        protected int getConversionData()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Read the digital value of the sensor, that the AdC has converted.
        Returns:
        The digital value of the sensor.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading the sensor.
